EmailTemplate.description: 777 Follow-up communication if the review is still in process and we are delaying 2 more days
EmailTemplate.name: Order Expedite Request Additional Follow-up Required
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Expedite Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Purchase Order Number: <Enter customer PO Number>
Sales Order Number: <Enter sales order number>
Our Supply Chain organization is still evaluating every possibility to support your requirements. We appreciate your patience as we continue to explore all opportunities to support your request.
Please allow 2 additional business days, after which we will respond with a final status.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
